Big Faceless PDF Library 2.27.2
  • All Classes
 

Deprecated API

Contents

  • Fields
  • Methods
  • Constructors
  • Fields 
    Field Description
    org.faceless.pdf2.FormSignature.HANDLER_SELFSIGN
    There is no need to use this handler. Use an AcrobatSignatureHandlerFactory instead.
    org.faceless.pdf2.FormSignature.HANDLER_VERISIGN
    There is no need to use this handler. Use an AcrobatSignatureHandlerFactory instead.
    org.faceless.pdf2.OutputProfile.Feature.PurgeResources
    the PurgeResources feature is now always on, there's no need to set it
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    org.faceless.pdf2.EmbeddedFile.setPortfolioFolder​(String)
    see the Portfolio class for details on how to manager Portfolios since 2.26
    org.faceless.pdf2.OutputProfile.getOutputCondition​(String)
    manage the OutputIntents through the OutputProfile.getOutputIntents() method and OutputIntent class.
    org.faceless.pdf2.OutputProfile.getOutputConditionIdentifier​(String)
    manage the OutputIntents through the OutputProfile.getOutputIntents() method and OutputIntent class.
    org.faceless.pdf2.OutputProfile.getOutputConditionRegistry​(String)
    manage the OutputIntents through the OutputProfile.getOutputIntents() method and OutputIntent class.
    org.faceless.pdf2.OutputProfile.getOutputIntentDestinationProfile​(String)
    manage the OutputIntents through the OutputProfile.getOutputIntents() method and OutputIntent class.
    org.faceless.pdf2.OutputProfile.getOutputIntentInfo​(String)
    manage the OutputIntents through the OutputProfile.getOutputIntents() method and OutputIntent class.
    org.faceless.pdf2.OutputProfile.getOutputIntentTypes()
    manage the OutputIntents through the OutputProfile.getOutputIntents() method and OutputIntent class.
    org.faceless.pdf2.OutputProfile.setOutputIntent​(String, String, String, String, String, ICC_Profile)
    manage the OutputIntents through the OutputProfile.getOutputIntents() method and OutputIntent class.
    org.faceless.pdf2.OutputProfiler.setMaxImageDPI​(OutputProfiler.ImageType, float, float)
    please call OutputProfiler.setImageAction(org.faceless.pdf2.OutputProfiler.ImageAction) instead.
    org.faceless.pdf2.PageExtractor.getStyledText​(PageExtractor.Text, int, PageExtractor.Text, int, boolean)
    see PageExtractor.getStyledText(Text, int, Text, int, Comparator)
    org.faceless.pdf2.PageExtractor.getText​(PageExtractor.Text, int, PageExtractor.Text, int, boolean)
    see PageExtractor.getStyledText(Text, int, Text, int, Comparator)
    org.faceless.pdf2.PDF.getFullOutputProfile()
    since 2.18 the OutputProfiler class gives more control and should be used instead of PDF.getFullOutputProfile
    org.faceless.pdf2.PDF.makePortfolio​(boolean)
    call #getPortfolio instead
    org.faceless.pdf2.PDF.setOutputProfile​(OutputProfile)
    since 2.18 the OutputProfiler class or PDF(OutputProfile) constructor should be used instead of calling PDF.setOutputProfile
    org.faceless.pdf2.PDFCanvas.setWatermarkOrBackground​(boolean, boolean)
    this method hasn't worked for some time. Use the PDFCanvas.setOptionalContentDescriptor(org.faceless.pdf2.OptionalContentDescriptor) method instead.
    org.faceless.pdf2.PDFImage.quantize()
    call quantize(256, 0)
    org.faceless.pdf2.PDFStyle.getTextWidths​(char[], int, int, float[], float[])
    call PDFStyle.createGlyphVector(java.lang.String, java.util.Locale) and retrieve this information from there
    org.faceless.pdf2.StandardEncryptionHandler.setAcrobat9Level​(int, int, int, boolean)
    the encryption algorithm used by Acrobat 9 has ben found to be less secure than the algorithm used by Acrobat 7, so as of 2.11.19 a request for Acrobat 9 encryption will fall back to Acrobat 7 encryption.
    org.faceless.pdf2.viewer2.DocumentPanel.redraw​(Object)
    DocumentPanel.redraw() is no longer required as this object now listens to PropertyChangeEvents fired by the PDF. This method is not called anywhere and is a no-op
    org.faceless.pdf2.viewer2.Exporter.getComponent()
    Subclasses should override Exporter.getComponent(DocumentPanel,File) instead
    org.faceless.pdf2.viewer2.feature.KeyStoreSignatureProvider.X509SignatureState.getCertificate()
    call KeyStoreSignatureProvider.X509SignatureState.getUnverifiableCertificate() instead
    org.faceless.pdf2.viewer2.PDFViewer.loadPDF​(File, EncryptionHandler)
    this method has been superceded by the PDFImporter class
    org.faceless.pdf2.WidgetAnnotation.getTextValue()
    since 2.11 just call getValue() instead.
    org.faceless.pdf2.WidgetAnnotation.setTextValue​(String)
    since 2.11 just call #setValue
  • Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    org.faceless.pdf2.OpenTypeFont​(int, InputStream)
    call OpenTypeFont(in, Integer.toString(index))
